p.d: The châteaux of the Somme A journey through the prestigious past of the châteaux in the land of the Somme. Kamini heads off to meet the owners and also the men and women working to pass on and look after this exceptional and often little known heritage. Programme summary: - Rambures, a veritable fortress - Good manners - Regniere-Écluse, the perfect cinema set - Restorer, a profession with a future - The château with a thousand doves - Trainer for racing pigeons Presented by: Kamini.
